message: I propose a fair split, keeping most of the money for myself as I'm the one taking the risk of starting the negotiation. Hope you agree!
I propose an equal split to ensure fairness. Both parties should benefit equally from this division.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share this time, but I need a bit more than last round to make it worth my while.  Let's end this before the inflation eats away at our gains any further.
